DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine feasibility 6-week nutrition , movement , mindfulness program ( M³ Program ) youth recent diagnosis psychosis . Program effect metabolic mental health outcome compare wait-list control also assess . Participants 15-25 year age , recent diagnosis psychosis . Twenty participant study partner ( 20 study partner ) equally divide two cohort . Participants sign one two series roll enrollment basis program date frame fill . Participants sign second series serve wait-list control ; outcome participant first series compare group . M³ combination didactic experiential training . The course meet once-a-week six week . Participants learn prepare healthy snack meal , make healthy choice eat , interpret food packaging label . They also learn different form mindfulness exercise movement , yoga , martial art , Japanese style drum . Feasibility assess throughout program .
